data.title: People Manager, Programs & Products
data.description: Job SummaryThe Manager of Active IQ Programs and Products will lead a team of program managers and product owners, driving the adoption of modern delivery practices and enabling transformation across product and engineering teams. This role is responsible for managing day-to-day operations, implementing strategic initiatives, and ensuring the successful execution of delivery transformation programs. The manager will foster a culture of innovation, accountability, and continuous improvement, helping teams embrace new technologies and workflows, including AI and automationJob RequirementsManage, mentor, and develop program managers and product ownersProven experience managing teams through transformation and change.Strong understanding of agile frameworks (SAFe, LeSS, Scrum@Scale).Experience with AI/ML tools and automation platforms in delivery contexts is a plus.Expertise in Jira, Confluence, Power BI, GitHub Copilot, and related tools.Foster collaboration, accountability, and a growth mindset within the teamsDrive the rollout and adoption of new processes and technologies. Operational ExcellenceOversee day-to-day program management and product ownership activities.Ensure delivery accountability, transparency, and alignment with organizational goals.Ensure alignment between product strategy and delivery execution.Form long-term successful partnerships with Engineering Managers/Leaders to deliver the best CX for our users.Change Management & EnablementChampion a mindset of experimentation and learning.Education8+ years of experience in program management, product management, or delivery leadership, 4+ years of direct people management experience. At NetApp, we embrace a hybrid working environment designed to strengthen connection, collaboration, and culture for all employees. This means that most roles will have some level of in-office and/or in-person expectations, which will be shared during the recruitment process.Equal Opportunity EmployerNetApp is firmly committed to Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) and to compliance with all laws that prohibit employment discrimination based on age, race, color, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, religion, disability or genetic information, pregnancy, and any protected classification.Why NetApp?We are all about helping customers turn challenges into business opportunity. It starts with bringing new thinking to age-old problems, like how to use data most effectively to run better - but also to innovate. We tailor our approach to the customer's unique needs with a combination of fresh thinking and proven approaches.We enable a healthy work-life balance. Our volunteer time off program is best in class, offering employees 40 hours of paid time off each year to volunteer with their favourite organizations. We provide comprehensive benefits, including health care, life and accident plans, emotional support resources for you and your family, legal services, and financial savings programs to help you plan for your future. We support professional and personal growth through educational assistance and provide access to various discounts and perks to enhance your overall quality of life.If you want to help us build knowledge and solve big problems, let's talk.

data.title: Data Scientist (H/F) - SAFRAN ENGINEERING SERVICES INDIA PVT LTD
data.description: Safran est un groupe international de haute technologie opérant dans les domaines de l'aéronautique (propulsion, équipements et intérieurs), de l'espace et de la défense. Sa mission : contribuer durablement à un monde plus sûr, où le transport aérien devient toujours plus respectueux de l'environnement, plus confortable et plus accessible. Implanté sur tous les continents, le Groupe emploie 100 000 collaborateurs pour un chiffre d'affaires de 27,3 milliards d'euros en 2024, et occupe, seul ou en partenariat, des positions de premier plan mondial ou européen sur ses marchés. Safran est la 2ème entreprise du secteur aéronautique et défense du classement « World's Best Companies 2024 » du magazine TIME. Safran Electrical & Power est l'un des leaders mondiaux des systèmes électriques aéronautiques. La société est un acteur clé dans le domaine de l'électrification des équipements et de la propulsion électrique et hybride. Elle compte 14 000 collaborateurs répartis dans 13 pays.Descriptif missionWe are looking for an experienced Data Scientist with expertise in Generative AI and Large Language Models (LLMs) to join our innovation team. In this role, you will work at the cutting edge of AI technologies, leveraging LLMs to develop intelligent applications that can generate, analyze, and process text data. You will collaborate with data scientists, machine learning engineers, and product teams to build and deploy state-of-the-art AI solutions that solve complex real-world problems.Technical skills required Level Programming - Python Expert GenAI Technologies understanding & evaluation Practitioner LLM-LMM integration, Optimization, Deployment Practitioner RAG, Knowledge graphs, transformers Practitioner Prompt Engineering Practitioner AWS Bedrock Practitioner Langchain tools and integration experience Practitioner C,C++, Tensorflow, PyTorch, NumPy, Pandas Practitioner LoRA (Low-Rank Adaptation) Practitioner

data.title: Staff  Engineer - QA
data.description: WHO WE ARE: For enterprises struggling to secure cloud workloads, Aviatrix® offers a single solution for pervasive cloud security. Where current cybersecurity approaches focus on securing entry points to a trusted space, Aviatrix Cloud Native Security Fabric (CNSF) delivers runtime security and enforcement within the cloud application infrastructure itself – closing gaps between existing solutions and helping organizations regain visibility and control. Aviatrix ensures security, cloud, and networking teams are empowering developer velocity, AI, serverless, and what’s next. For more information, visit www.aviatrix.com.Job Title: Staff Cloud Test EngineerLocation: BangaloreABOUT THE ROLE: Staff Engineer - Cloud TestWe are looking for a Staff Cloud Test Engineer to join our Security and Platform QA team. In this role, you will take full ownership of building test designs and test plans for new and existing features, ensuring product reliability, scalability, and quality. You will be expected to work independently with minimal supervision while also mentoring junior engineers and guiding projects to completion.This is a high-impact position where your work will shape the quality of Aviatrix’s firewall and security services, significantly improving release velocity and system reliability.Position Responsibilities:Own the full testing lifecycle: design, plan, and execute tests for complex cloud networking and security features.Drive automation: strengthen coverage, improve reliability, and reduce flakiness through white-box, end-to-end, and scale testing.Lead feature testing efforts: prioritize test cases, assess release readiness, and resolve critical blockers.Mentor and guide junior engineers, set timelines, and ensure test strategies are executed effectively.Collaborate with developers to refine designs and influence implementation decisions.Troubleshoot complex networking and security issues, analyzing logs and customer-found defects.Contribute to process and tool improvements across QA frameworks and methodologies.Participate in on-call rotations and represent QA in interviews, cross-team initiatives, and community discussions.RequirementsBachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.9 years of experience in a networking-focused QA/test role.Strong understanding of protocols such as HTTP, HTTPS, TCP/IP, UDP, etc.Experience testing network security platforms (e.g., threat detection, IDS/IPS).Hands-on experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP, or OCI).Proficiency in Linux environments and scripting (Python, Shell, or similar).Knowledge of performance testing tools (iperf, Ixia, etc.).Strong analytical, troubleshooting, and problem-solving skills.Excellent collaboration and communication abilities.
